title: Disturbed Announce 2025 North American Tour Celebrating 25th Anniversary of The Sickness
description: Support will be provided by Three Days Grace, Daughtry, Sevendust, and Nothing More. Disturbed Announce 2025 North American Tour Celebrating 25th Anniversary of The Sickness Spencer Kaufman
author: Spencer Kaufman
excerpt: Disturbed are celebrating the 25th anniversary of their debut album, The Sickness, with an extensive 2025 North American tour. See the dates and ticket info.
text: Disturbed are celebrating the 25th anniversary of their seminal debut album, The Sickness, with an extensive 2025 North American tour. The outing will find the metal band performing the multiplatinum album in its entirety plus a second set of greatest hits from the rest of their discography. The 34-date tour kicks off February 25th in Nampa, Idaho, and runs through a May 17th show in Las Vegas, hitting Chicago, Boston, New York City, Toronto, Seattle, San Francisco, and more cities along the way. The first 12 dates on the run will feature support from Three Days Grace (featuring the return of original singer Adam Gontier) and Sevendust, while the last 22 shows will include support from Daughtry and Nothing More. Get Disturbed Tickets Here A Live Nation pre-sale starts Wednesday, October 16th, at 12 p.m. local time using the code TEMPO, with a general on-sale beginning next Friday, October 18th, at 10 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster. The Sickness was released March 7th, 2000, and has been certified five-times platinum by the RIAA. The album yielded the Mainstream Rock radio hits “Stupify,” “Down with the Sickness,” “Voices,” and “The Game.” According to a press release, a 2025 UK/European tour will also be announced. Prior to next year’s run, Disturbed have three more 2024 dates on their schedule, including an appearance at the Aftershock festival in Sacramento this Sunday (October 13th). See Disturbed’s full list of tour dates below. Disturbed 2024-2025 Tour Dates: 10/13 – Sacramento, CA @ Aftershock Festival 11/02 – Santiago, CL @ Knotfest Chile 11/20 – Mexico City, MX @ Foro Sol # 02/25 – Nampa, ID @ Ford Idaho Center Arena * 02/27 – Denver, CO @ Ball Arena * 03/02 – Saint Louis, MO @ Enterprise Center * 03/04 – Milwaukee, WI @ Fiserv Forum * 03/06 – Minneapolis, MN @ Target Center * 03/08 – Chicago, IL @ United Center * 03/10 – Detroit, MI @ Little Caesars Arena * 03/12 – Louisville, KY @ KFC Yum! Center * 03/14 – Boston, MA @ TD Garden * 03/17 – Washington, DC @ Capital One Arena * 03/19 – Montreal, QC @ Centre Bell * 03/21 – New York, NY @ Madison Square Garden * 03/29 – Cincinnati, OH @ Heritage Bank Center ^ 03/31 – Cleveland, OH @ Rocket Mortgage Fieldhouse ^ 04/02 – Philadelphia, PA @ Wells Fargo Center ^ 04/04 – Buffalo, NY @ KeyBank Center ^ 04/05 – Pittsburgh, PA @ PPG Paints Arena ^ 04/07 – Toronto, ON @ Scotiabank Arena ^ 04/09 – Indianapolis, IN @ Gainbridge Fieldhouse ^ 04/12 – Charlotte, NC @ Spectrum Center ^ 04/14 – Raleigh, NC @ Lenovo Center ^ 04/16 – Birmingham, AL @ Legacy Arena at The BJCC ^ 04/18 – Sunrise, FL @ Amerant Bank Arena ^ 04/23 – Duluth, GA @ Gas South Arena ^ 04/25 – San Antonio, TX @ AT&T Center ^ 04/26 – Fort Worth, TX @ Dickies Arena ^ 04/28 – Oklahoma City, OK Paycom Center ^ 05/05 – Seattle, WA @ Climate Pledge Arena ^ 05/07 – Portland, OR @ Moda Center ^ 05/09 – Sacramento, CA @ Golden 1 Center ^ 05/10 – San Francisco, CA @ Chase Center ^ 05/13 – Inglewood, CA @ Kia Forum ^ 05/15 – Phoenix, AZ @ Footprint Center ^ 05/17 – Las Vegas, NV @ MGM Grand Garden Arena ^ * = w/ Three Days Grace and Sevendust ^ = w/ Daughtry and Nothing More # = supporting Iron Maiden
html:
Disturbed are celebrating the 25th anniversary of their seminal debut album, The Sickness, with an extensive 2025 North American tour. The outing will find the metal band performing the multiplatinum album in its entirety plus a second set of greatest hits from the rest of their discography.

The 34-date tour kicks off February 25th in Nampa, Idaho, and runs through a May 17th show in Las Vegas, hitting Chicago, Boston, New York City, Toronto, Seattle, San Francisco, and more cities along the way. The first 12 dates on the run will feature support from Three Days Grace (featuring the return of original singer Adam Gontier) and Sevendust, while the last 22 shows will include support from Daughtry and Nothing More.

Get Disturbed Tickets Here

A Live Nation pre-sale starts Wednesday, October 16th, at 12 p.m. local time using the code TEMPO, with a general on-sale beginning next Friday, October 18th, at 10 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster.

The Sickness was released March 7th, 2000, and has been certified five-times platinum by the RIAA. The album yielded the Mainstream Rock radio hits “Stupify,” “Down with the Sickness,” “Voices,” and “The Game.”

According to a press release, a 2025 UK/European tour will also be announced. Prior to next year’s run, Disturbed have three more 2024 dates on their schedule, including an appearance at the Aftershock festival in Sacramento this Sunday (October 13th).

See Disturbed’s full list of tour dates below.

Disturbed 2024-2025 Tour Dates:
